titleStmt.title: The anatomie of Pope Ioane Wherein her life, manners and death is liuely layed abroad and opened, and the forged cauils and allegations that our aduersaries vse further, thoroughly vnripped and confuted. Necessarie for all those that are not fully acquainted with the storie, and not vnfruitfull to all them that loue and embrace the true religion of Christ, and abhorre the sortish illusions of Romish antichrist. Written by I.M.
titleStmt.author: Mayo, John, fl. 1607-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Field dwelling in great Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Pages cropped and stained, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
